summary: A big estate located near Rorikstead themed for a dragonslayer. All DLCs required.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#38761d][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]An estate with a wall around it located near [u]Rorikstead[/u] (image) that is themed for a dragonslayer.
House is free, but you need to solve a riddle engraved on the tablet (image) by the previous owner[u]
Notes for the displays[/u] are in the drawers under the book shelf (image)

[u][color=#ff7700]ALL DLCs ARE REQUIRED[/color][/u]
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71156/?]
Portuguese-BR Translation[/url][b] [/b]by metal33br[/size]


[color=#38761d][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Navmeshed inside and all around, so the only way to enter is through the 2 iron gates
[color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Lockable iron gates outside
[b][color=#38761d]->[/color][/b] Optimized for better performance
[color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Garden, Bees, Animals (2 cows and 4 chickens) and Alchemy Garden
[b][/b][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Alchemy, Enchanting and Smithing inside[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] [i]Displays:[/i] Dragon Claws, Dragon Priest Masks, Daedric Artifacts and Blades Collection[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Bathroom with a bath, sauna, toilet and script to remove equipment (not the player)[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Armory with 8 mannequins, 6 shield racks and 15 weapon racks[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Room for 3 followers[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Lots of idle markers for sandboxing[/size]
[size=3][color=#38761d][b]->[/b][/color] Secret room to store you treasures[/size]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=5][/size][/url][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size][size=3]

[size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod[/size][/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
